# Block mass data scrapers / bad bots
User-agent: CCBot
Disallow: /

## Core Pages
-[Home](https://www.rialtosocial.co.uk/):Rialto Social homepageâ€”Italian dining in Dorking plus karaoke, darts, and PS5 room bookings.
-[Menu](https://www.rialtosocial.co.uk/menu):Food & drink menus including pizza, pasta, gelato and more.
-[About](https://www.rialtosocial.co.uk/about):The Rialto story (est. 2001) and the "Rialto Social" reimagining with new experiences.
-[Entertainment](https://www.rialtosocial.co.uk/entertainment):Karaoke (Karafun), darts and PS5 gaming information plus booking details.
-[Events](https://www.rialtosocial.co.uk/events):Upcoming events and announcements.
-[Gallery](https://www.rialtosocial.co.uk/gallery):Venue and food photos, rooms, and atmosphere.
-[Contact](https://www.rialtosocial.co.uk/contact):How to contact Rialto Social, location details, and booking options.

## Policies
-[Privacy Policy](https://www.rialtosocial.co.uk/privacy):How Rialto Social collects and uses personal data (e.g., reservations and enquiries).
-[Cookie Policy](https://www.rialtosocial.co.uk/cookies):Cookie usage, categories, and preference management.
-[Terms of Service](https://www.rialtosocial.co.uk/terms):Terms for reservations, cancellations, dietary requirements, and service charge.
